when i change the name to the original name it loads it fine but when i change it to whatever i want it downloads the original[/quote]
That doesn’t sound right… Change the name in findcachedir() which is in signlink.java

item.title: PI Cache
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

starbeast199:

that still doesn’t work :\ it still keeps downloading the original cache

You need to change the link, compile the code, and make sure it’s updated. You also need to distribute the new client to your users (if any).

Read full topic

item.title: PI Cache
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

This is client sided.

However;

In your client you’ll probably have a file called “CacheDownloader.java” in that file will be a link to the cache.
That’s the link you change.

When you zip the cache, you must zip the cache files and not the folder that contains them. That would mean when you open the .zip it would have all the files (and folders) the cache requires. It wouldn’t be just 1 folder.

Read full topic
